SELECT TOTAL_POINT, MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM R, TOTAL_POINT, MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM ( SELECT P.TOTAL_POINT, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM TBL_POINT P INNER JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON P.MEMBER_NUMBER = M.MEMBER_NUMBER ORDER BY TOTAL_POINT DESC )
WHERE ROWNUM<=5 )
SELECT M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, COUNT(*) AS ADOPTS FROM TBL_MEMBER M FULL OUTER JOIN TBL_REPLY R ON M.MEMBER_NUMBER = R.MEMBER_NUMBER WHERE R.REPLY_ADOPT=1 GROUP BY M.MEMBER_NICKNAME ORDER BY ADOPTS DESC
SELECT M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, COUNT(*) AS REPLIES FROM TBL_MEMBER M JOIN TBL_REPLY R ON M.MEMBER_NUMBER = R.MEMBER_NUMBER GROUP BY M.MEMBER_NICKNAME ORDER BY REPLIES DESC
SELECT B.BOARD_NUMBER, B.BOARD_VIEWCOUNT, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, B.BOARD_TITLE FROM TBL_BOARD B JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON B.MEMBER_NUMBER = M.MEMBER_NUMBER ORDER BY B.BOARD_VIEWCOUNT DESC
